title: Filip Lukšík
text:
Filip Lukšík (born 3 February 1985) is a <a href="Slovakia">Slovak</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> defender.
Club career.
In 2010, he was join to <a href="Odra%20Wodzis%C5%82aw">Odra Wodzisław</a> and played in polish <a href="Ekstraklasa">Ekstraklasa</a>. On 27 June 2011, he has signed two-year contract with option for <a href="Netherlands">Dutch</a> club <a href="ADO%20Den%20Haag">ADO Den Haag</a> for an undisclosed fee. He was sent off in his ADO debut against <a href="FK%20Tauras%20Taurag%C4%97">FK Tauras</a> in 1st leg of the <a href="2011%E2%80%9312%20UEFA%20Europa%20League%20qualifying%20phase%20and%20play-off%20round%23Second%20qualifying%20round">2011–12 UEFA Europa League 2nd qualifying round</a> after his foul in the <a href="penalty%20area">penalty area</a>.
International career.
Lukšík made his <a href="Slovakia%20national%20football%20team">national team</a> debut in a 1–0 away win against <a href="Andorra%20national%20football%20team">Andorra</a> on 26 March 2011.
